page.title: 09Prema Arts Project
page.content: The idea of Prema was thought of eight years ago and it actually opened five years ago,in 1980,in the village of Uley. Mr.Wood and some friends spent three years collecting money and converting the old Bethesda Chapel in South Street into an Art Centre before they opened. Prema's role in the village is to provide the opportunity for anyone,old,middle_aged and young,to come and have a go at different Arts. Prema also gives you a chance to come and enjoy the best of musical theatre and painting in the country. Each month Prema has a different exhibition of paintings and drawings.Prema also has poetry readings,folk concerts and other things in their upstairs room.Prema has music of different kinds such as classical and music from different countries.
